title: Bleeder's Diegest: The Thing in the Road Guest
itunes:title: Bleeder's Diegest: The Thing in the Road Guest
itunes:subtitle: Two sisters encounter evil on a dark deserted highway one October night. Guest Starring Katie Cassidy. Written by: Krsy ( FoxWillow: Katie CassidyJesse: Krsy FoxRadio announcers: Krsy FoxInstagram: https://instagram.com/bleeder...
description:
Two sisters encounter evil on a dark deserted highway one October night. Guest Starring Katie Cassidy. 

Written by: Krsy ( Fox

Willow: Katie Cassidy

Jesse: Krsy Fox

Radio announcers: Krsy Fox


Instagram: https://instagram.com/bleedersdiegest?utm_medium=copy_link

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bleedersdiegest?s=21



Information about Bleeders DIEgest:


Original scary stories delivered as a fully immersive theatrical experience. From your speakers, straight into your psyche. Our tales are guaranteed to terrify the bravest of souls (even the dead ones).


Currated and written by Trevor and Lauren Shand (Boo Crew Podcast). Krsy Fox (Filmmaker/Musician FRANK, I Live Alone, Knee High Fox) and Spider One (Powerman 5000). Select episodes will feature horror celebrities such as Bonnie Aarons (The Conjuring 2, The

Nun), Scout Compton (Rob Zombie’s Halloween), Bill Mosley (House of 1000 corpses/Devil’s Rejects/Texas Chainsaw 2), Spencer Charnas (from the band- Ice Nine Kills), Chaz Bono (American Horror Story), Adam Busch (Buffy The Vampire Slayer) Katie Cassidy (Black

Christmas/A Nightmare on Elm Street) as guest readers. We dare you to listen!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
